78 
79 // Just create a mixture for our purposes
80 std::shared_ptr<Mixture> getMixture(const std::string& species)
81 {
82  MixtureOptions opts;
83  opts.setSpeciesDescriptor(species);
84  opts.setStateModel("ChemNonEqTTv");
85  opts.setThermodynamicDatabase("RRHO");
86  return std::shared_ptr<Mixture>(new Mixture(opts));
87 };
88 
89 
90 // Test a single mixture
91 void testMixture(
92  const std::string& species, const std::vector<double>& rhos,
93  const std::vector<double>& Ts)
94 {
95  auto mix = getMixture(species);
96  mix->setState(rhos.data(), Ts.data(), 1);
97  double rho = mix->density();
98 
99  ArrayXd input_rhoe(mix->nEnergyEqns());
100  mix->mixtureEnergies(input_rhoe.data());
101  input_rhoe *= rho;
102 
103  mix->setState(rhos.data(), input_rhoe.data(), 0);
104 
105  ArrayXd output_rhoe(mix->nEnergyEqns());
106  mix->mixtureEnergies(output_rhoe.data());
107  output_rhoe *= rho;
108 
109  for (int i = 0; i < mix->nEnergyEqns(); ++i) {
110  std::cout << input_rhoe[i] << " == " << output_rhoe[i] << '\n';
111  CHECK(input_rhoe[i] == output_rhoe[i]);
112  }
113 }
114 
115 
116 TEST_CASE(
117  "Bug #139 fix: vibronic energies unchanged after setState",
118  "[bugs][thermodynamics]"
119 )
120 {
121  testMixture("N O NO N2 O2", {
122  0.0831209815439599, 0.03252762384728387, 0.0005480571702340367,
123  0.02473956358534552, 8.688041095193619e-06
124  }, {
125  8042.055877561177, 14387.97157416015
126  }
127  );
128 
129  testMixture("e- N+ O+ NO+ N2+ O2+ N O NO N2 O2", {
130  3.772083171225316e-07, 0.008217402454188135, 0.00158203164044893,
131  3.349905442259246e-06, 3.818030661535437e-06, 5.411162803271429e-08,
132  0.03034510868639386, 0.01013019524997852, 1.718604852728191e-06,
133  1.311304142186017e-05, 6.967273753567727e-08
134  }, {
135  11742.36111897272, 5078.056874545492
136  }
137  );
138 
139  testMixture("e- C+ O+ C O CO CO2 O2", {
140  1.634350644243097e-07, 0.003106515000745763, 0.0006160141919509619,
141  0.02351932703393298, 0.07072164609821735, 0.0007229419681532173,
142  3.470025039233278e-08, 1.019784785257949e-05
143  }, {
144  15212.22216121357, 9718.179857642906
145  }
146  );
147 }
